amendment.description: Amendment to reinstate the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau's final rule governing forced arbitration, within 60 days of enactment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part A of House Report 116-79 to reinstate the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau's final rule governing forced arbitration, within 60 days of enactment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green (TX) amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 193 (Roll no. 226).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Green (TX).
